lines.text: Charlie, look! Charlie, look! They're making love, they're making love!
lines.character: Harry Leeds, Owner of Chez Harry

lines.text: I beg yours, I beg yours, rub-a-dub.
I feel like a whore at a choir boy's orgy.
I mean you're hardly Genghis Khan, so don't waft your feathers too high or we'll see your corsets!
You're going to hang me, angel of doom?

[consoling Charlie]
We'll build a staircase up to the sky. We'll not be lonely, flying so high.
lines.character: Harry Leeds, Owner of Chez Harry
